xs:element.name: ReportColumnList
xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportColumn, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportCondition, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportSubCondition, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

xs:element.name: SubReportInformationList
xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportInformation, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

ReportTitle.StrSql: select ANES_DOCTOR, Ⅰ级, Ⅱ级, Ⅲ级, Ⅳ级, 其他,nvl(Ⅰ级, 0) + nvl(Ⅱ级, 0) + nvl(Ⅲ级, 0) + nvl(Ⅳ级, 0) + nvl(其他, 0) SUMS from (select NVL(C.USER_NAME, A.ANES_DOCTOR) ANES_DOCTOR, decode(b.anes_effect, 'Ⅰ级', 'Ⅰ级', 'Ⅱ级', 'Ⅱ级', 'Ⅲ级', 'Ⅲ级', 'Ⅳ级', 'Ⅳ级', '其他') anes_effect, COUNT(*) NUMS from med_operation_master a, MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA b, MED_HIS_USERS C where a.patient_id = b.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = b.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = b.oper_id(+) AND A.ANES_DOCTOR = C.USER_JOB_ID(+) AND a.oper_status_code > 35 and a.anes_start_time >= :STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.anes_method like '%'||:vanesmethod||'%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%'||:voperationname||'%' or :voperationname is null) and (a.dept_code = :deptcode or :deptcode is null) GROUP BY NVL(C.USER_NAME, A.ANES_DOCTOR), decode(b.anes_effect, 'Ⅰ级', 'Ⅰ级', 'Ⅱ级', 'Ⅱ级', 'Ⅲ级', 'Ⅲ级', 'Ⅳ级', 'Ⅳ级', '其他')) pivot(sum(nums) for anes_effect in('Ⅰ级' Ⅰ级, 'Ⅱ级' Ⅱ级, 'Ⅲ级' Ⅲ级, 'Ⅳ级' Ⅳ级, '其他' 其他))

select d.inp_no, A.PATIENT_ID,A.VISIT_ID,A.OPER_ID, b.name, B.SEX, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth ,a.in_date_time ) age, nvl(c.dept_name, a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name, TO_CHAR(a.in_date_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date_time, nvl(u1.user_name,a.surgeon) surgeon, a.oper_scale, a.anes_method, nvl(u2.user_name,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor, a.asa_grade, to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime, decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(u3.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE, nvl(u4.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE， f.Anes_Effect from med_operation_master a, med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users u1,med_his_users u2,med_his_users u3,med_his_users u4 ,MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA f where a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and a.dept_code = c.dept_code(+) and a.surgeon= u1.user_job_id(+) and a.anes_doctor=u2.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE = u3.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE = u4.user_job_id(+) and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and a.patient_id = f.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = f.visit_id(+) and a.visit_id = d.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = f.oper_id(+) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and (a.anes_method like '%' || :vanesmethod || '%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%' || :voperationname || '%' or :voperationname is null) AND （u2.USER_NAME =:VANES_DOCTOR or a.anes_doctor =:VANES_DOCTOR )

select d.inp_no,A.PATIENT_ID,A.VISIT_ID,A.OPER_ID, b.name, B.SEX, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth ,a.in_date_time ) age, nvl(c.dept_name, a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name, TO_CHAR(a.in_date_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date_time, nvl(u1.user_name,a.surgeon) surgeon, a.oper_scale, a.anes_method, nvl(u2.user_name,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor, a.asa_grade, to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime, decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(u3.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE, nvl(u4.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE, f.Anes_Effect from med_operation_master a, med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users u1,med_his_users u2,med_his_users u3,med_his_users u4 ,MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA f where a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and a.dept_code = c.dept_code(+) and a.surgeon= u1.user_job_id(+) and a.anes_doctor=u2.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE = u3.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE = u4.user_job_id(+) and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and a.patient_id = f.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = f.visit_id(+) and a.visit_id = d.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = f.oper_id(+) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and (a.anes_method like '%' || :vanesmethod || '%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%' || :voperationname || '%' or :voperationname is null) AND （u2.USER_NAME =:VANES_DOCTOR or a.anes_doctor =:VANES_DOCTOR ) and nvl(F.Anes_Effect, '其他')='Ⅰ级'

select d.inp_no,A.PATIENT_ID,A.VISIT_ID,A.OPER_ID, b.name, B.SEX, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth ,a.in_date_time ) age, nvl(c.dept_name, a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name, TO_CHAR(a.in_date_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date_time, nvl(u1.user_name,a.surgeon) surgeon, a.oper_scale, a.anes_method, nvl(u2.user_name,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor, a.asa_grade, to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime, decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(u3.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE, nvl(u4.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE, f.Anes_Effect from med_operation_master a, med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users u1,med_his_users u2,med_his_users u3,med_his_users u4 ,MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA f where a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and a.dept_code = c.dept_code(+) and a.surgeon= u1.user_job_id(+) and a.anes_doctor=u2.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE = u3.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE = u4.user_job_id(+) and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and a.patient_id = f.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = f.visit_id(+) and a.visit_id = d.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = f.oper_id(+) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and (a.anes_method like '%' || :vanesmethod || '%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%' || :voperationname || '%' or :voperationname is null) AND （u2.USER_NAME =:VANES_DOCTOR or a.anes_doctor =:VANES_DOCTOR ) and nvl(F.Anes_Effect, '其他')='Ⅱ级'

select d.inp_no,A.PATIENT_ID,A.VISIT_ID,A.OPER_ID, b.name, B.SEX, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth ,a.in_date_time ) age, nvl(c.dept_name, a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name, TO_CHAR(a.in_date_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date_time, nvl(u1.user_name,a.surgeon) surgeon, a.oper_scale, a.anes_method, nvl(u2.user_name,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor, a.asa_grade, to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime, decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(u3.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE, nvl(u4.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE, f.Anes_Effect from med_operation_master a, med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users u1,med_his_users u2,med_his_users u3,med_his_users u4 ,MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA f where a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and a.dept_code = c.dept_code(+) and a.surgeon= u1.user_job_id(+) and a.anes_doctor=u2.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE = u3.user_job_id(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE = u4.user_job_id(+) and A.OPER_STATUS_CODE>35 and a.patient_id = f.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id = f.visit_id(+) and a.visit_id = d.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id = f.oper_id(+) and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and (a.anes_method like '%' || :vanesmethod || '%' or :vanesmethod is null) and (a.anes_doctor = :vanesdoctor or :vanesdoctor is null) and (a.operation_name like '%' || :voperationname || '%' or :voperationname is null) AND （u2.USER_NAME =:VANES_DOCTOR or a.anes_doctor =:VANES_DOCTOR ) and nvl(F.Anes_Effect, '其他')='Ⅲ级'
